Posts.Content: Jan 1, 2013 11:53PM Bear74 wrote: Good luck tomorrow zennurse, I know you must be so worried. I've mammogram and ultrasound on Thursday morn and am barely sleeping with worry. Lymph nodes in left armpit are very swollen and past few days I've noticed that my bra causing discomfort on the underside of left breast. Paranoid isn't the word for it. As if to make matters worse my husband has taken Thursday off work "just in case"! As worried as I am, I haven't told him I am, so now that I know that he is just as worried, makes me worse! Does that make sense? Sorry, venting on your post! I really hope what you have turns out to be nothing serious. Take care.
Posts.Title: honest opinions greatly appreciated re. symptoms... zennurse Moderators

Posts.Content: Jan 3, 2013 10:39PM Bear74 wrote: Bryona and Zennurse, I had my mammogram and ultrasound this morning. All I have is swollen benign lymph nodes in my armpit. Nothing showed up on the mammogram. I have to back in one year. To say I'm relieved is an understatement! I have gone crazy with worry the past two weeks. The best thing about all of this is it has made me more aware of my body and I will be checking myself monthly. Bryona, I wish you a speedy recovery through this. Thank you for being there! Zennurse I am hoping everything turns out to be fine with you, good luck with your appointment.
